name: Snake Blast
description:
Controls: 
A and D to move
W to Jump
Mouse to aim
Left-Click to shoot
This is a physics based wave shooter where all the levels are joined together by springs. Snakes can be killed when pushed off the map or when their joints are broken.  Avoid going offscreen and kill snakes by pushing them off the map or breaking their joints are broken. Download the game for highscore!
Thanks for playing!!!
Made for the GMTK game jam
